scripts.build-scss: node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/public/assets/stylesheets/index.scss src/public/dist/css/index.css && node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/public/assets/stylesheets/resets.scss -w src/public/dist/css/resets.css && latte-carousel/dist/latte-carousel.min.css
scripts.build-scss-watch: node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/public/assets/stylesheets/index.scss src/public/dist/css/index.css && node-sass --omit-source-map-url src/public/assets/stylesheets/resets.scss -w src/public/dist/css/resets.css
